channel.title: Control Panel

item.title: Control Panel
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright, i have tried a few times to add A Ban option that bans a user and kicks them from the server threw this control panel. I had to fix alot when integrating it with my server but it works. I cannot add to it tho? Anybody able to help me out here? lol… tired of the funky errors like

";" exepected
jbutton6)))
             ^
and also under that for 2nd error would be
")" expected
jbutton6)))
              ^

Any help?

    private void jButton4ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jButton4ActionPerformed
// TODO add your handling code here:

cmd = jTextField1.getText();
String Ken = "Kenshin";
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Offline]Kenshin: " + cmd;
Print("Message Sent: " +cmd);

    }//GEN-LAST:event_jButton4ActionPerformed

    private void jButton5ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jButton5ActionPerformed
// TODO add your handling code here:
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jButton5ActionPerformed

    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jButton1ActionPerformed
//Kick all
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
Print("You kicked all players on the server!");
System.out.println("Kicking all players..");
System.out.println("Kicked all players - COMPLETE");






    }//GEN-LAST:event_jButton1ActionPerformed

    private void jButton3ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jButton3ActionPerformed
// TODO add your handling code here:



PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (120);
PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
Print("Server will be updated in 2 minutes! (120 seconds)");
System.out.println("Started Server update - 120 seconds");


    }//GEN-LAST:event_jButton3ActionPerformed

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jButton2ActionPerformed
// TODO add your handling code here:

JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this, "Made by Santaher0, 2007 - 2008, all rights reserved", "Credits", 1);
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jButton2ActionPerformed
    
    /**
     * @param args the command line arguments
     */
  public static void Print(String Text) {
			jTextArea1.append(Text + nline);
    	}
            public void run() {
                new CP().setVisible(true);
            }

That is the CP file.
NOTE: just putting this in your server files to try and take it wont make it work, there are codes needed to integrate it with the server.
